'''Composite Timber In-Port Transfer Cart''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Composite Timber In-Port Transfer Cart is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in the cave beneath [[The Sands of Three Canals]]. The area is unlocked during {{Quest|Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part II}}.
